fields.title: this-month-addition-to-our-offer-in-store
fields.slug: This month addition to our offer in store
fields.content: This new and fantastic bag just arrived in our warehouse for our producer. The bag is comfortable to wear and it is farbecht.
fields.short: This new and fantastic bag just arrived in our warehouse for our producer.

fields.title: new-sale
fields.content: This comfortable, leather bag is in sale now. Just take your chance to get one of this fantastic bags
fields.short: This comfortable, leather bag is in sale now.

fields.title: local-store
fields.content: Since many of you asked us whether they can see more of our products during a local pickup, we plan on opening a store next to our warehouse.
fields.short: We are planning on opening a local store.
